name: Check if the best buy store api can be updated by users by searching store by ID
id: testing-different-request-on-the-best-buy-api:Check if the best buy store api can be updated by users by searching store by ID

testSteps.description: When I send a PUT request to single storeID endpoint with updated information name "Matlab" type "T8" address "Sherman" address2 "Sherman Avenue" city "Los Angeles" state "California" zip "98568" lat "33.584" lng "114.587" hours "Mon-Sat 8.00am to 8.00pm" service1 "service id" service2 "Not available"

children.description: Updating store with name: Matlab_updated, type: T8, address: Sherman, address2: Sherman Avenue, city: Los Angeles, state: California, zip: 98568, lat: 33.584, lng: 114.587, hours: Mon-Sat 8.00am to 8.00pm, services: {service id=Not available}, storeId: 9800

testSteps.description: Then I must get back a valid status code "200"
